text:
Trying to invoke the server keep alive param on SCP task. Docs indicate it should be available from 1.9.7.

Tried 1.9.7, 1.9.9 and 1.10.1.

Same error each time:

scp doesn't support the "serverAliveIntervalSecond" attribute
creator: joe.falconer@btinternet.com
jaikiran@apache.org
text: The attribute is serverAliveIntervalSeconds (notice the 's' at the end). The error you pasted suggests that the build file is using serverAliveIntervalSecond instead.

Well spotted. 

Thanks - that was the problem.
creator: joe.falconer@btinternet.com
